actions.text: Field Hearings Held in Oakland, California.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain moves of sports franchises will be treated as sales.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that a prohibited move of a sports franchise shall be treated as a sale of such franchise and shall be subject to the capital gains tax. Specifies that such moves will not be treated as a sale if such treatment would result in the recognition of a loss.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain moves of sports franchises will be treated as sales.
